sure.. :D

Check out my latest torrent..

On your problem to get the game to work..there is a patch until the supercard team releases their latest convert software...

you should find it here..
http://l33t.spod.org/ratx/DS/SC/misc/lsw_sc.zip

heres a guide to use the patch..:


Use the SC software to make the save file and the 0kb file on your SD card, delete the 0kb file 
Rename the save file to Lego Star Wars II.nds.sav 

Using the patch file, unzip contents to c:\ 
Unzip the .nds file from your Lego Star Wars II rom to c:\ and rename it to clean.nds 
Go to START>RUN and type cmd 

type in c:\bspatch.exe clean.nds "Lego Star Wars II.nds.dsq" lsw_scl.bdf 

Close the black window and navigate to c:\ 

Copy Lego Star Wars II.nds.dsq to where you put your .nds files on your SD card. 

If you've done this correctly, in your Nintendo DS Games folder, along with all your other games, you should have two called.... 

Lego Star Wars II.nds.dsq 
Lego Star Wars II.nds.sav 

Put the SC in your DS and run it like normal!
